Understanding the components that go into calculating profitability is a crucial first step to cracking these cases, and in showing your business acumen during interviews. It is important to drill down to each lever that might affect either sales or costs.

Before suggesting any recommendations based on your findings from the component break-down, see if it's possible to segment the cost or revenue components further in order to uncover any additional insights. For example - exploring non-ticketing revenues or sales in cargo segment etc.
